name: Sunset Glow
description: A warm blend of orange and pink with a hint of red. It's soft, radiant, and evokes the last rays of sunlight over the horizon.

name: Ocean Deep
description: A rich marine blue with traces of green, reminiscent of clear tropical waters on a sunny day.

name: Forest Canopy
description: A deep, vibrant green with subtle dark undertones, like sunlight filtering through dense leaves.

name: Desert Sand
description: A warm, golden beige that captures the essence of sun-baked dunes under the midday sun.

name: Lavender Dream
description: A soft, misty purple with subtle grey undertones, like a field of lavender at dawn.

name: Crimson Tide
description: A bold, deep red that exudes passion and intensity, reminiscent of a dramatic sunset.

name: Golden Sunrise
description: A bright, golden yellow that captures the brilliance of the first light of day.

name: Misty Grey
description: A soft, neutral grey with a touch of blue, like a foggy morning sky.

name: Berry Bliss
description: A rich, vibrant magenta that combines the sweetness of berries with a touch of elegance.

name: Midnight Blue
description: A deep, dark blue that evokes the tranquility and mystery of the night sky.
